comment.body: Nice. I'll add the Apache 2.0 License ASAP. CC0-1.0 is problematic to some organizations.

comment.diff_hunk:
@@ -46,3 +27,18 @@ jobs:
       shell: nix develop .#ci -c bash -e {0}
       run: |
           make
+
+  emulate_test:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
+    - name: Setup nix
+      uses: ./.github/actions/setup-nix
+    - name: Emulate on QEMU
+      shell: nix develop .#ci -c bash -e {0}
+      run: |
+          make emulate
+
+          for file in elf/*.elf; do
+            make emulate ELF_FILE="$file"
comment.body:
This is not going to fail if the tests output `ERROS keys`, right? I don't see how this could ever fail. 
Can you please make sure this actually catches test failures?

pull_request.title: Add qemu emulation + CI tests
pull_request.body:
- add qemu as dependency and eliminate unnecessary dependencies for ci
- add support for mps2-an386 for emulating with qemu
- update README
- add flake usage to dev-support readme
- add emulate target for convenience
- format c files
- extract nix setup action
- add emulate to ci
